s: ^Ah, Welcome! How can I be of assistance to you?

customer1: ^Good afternoon. What's a guy gotta do around here to get a wig?

s: ^Well you've come to the right place Sir! I've actually got one wig left if you're interested.

onewig: ^Really? You're running a barbershop and you've only got one wig left?

s: ^What if I told you that this was no ordinary barbershop. *Winks* How about I go grab the wig for you before you make you make your decision.
^What kind of barbershops do you frequent where they just have wigs to spare? Huh!?

alright: ^You know what? Alright listen, I'll give you the benefit of the doubt. Just make me look like I'm in my prime again.

s: ^Go get the wig for the customer

neighbour: ^You better watch your attitude before I put you in your place. Now go get me that damn wig before I take my business elsewhere.

s: ^Go get the wig for the customer
